alert.note: Alert for Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 5:44PM CDT until July 22 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Saline County in central Kansas... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 544 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bennington, or 6 miles southeast of Minneapolis, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Salina, Smolan, New Cambria, Kipp and Salina Airport. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 86 and 95. Interstate 70 between Mile Markers 246 and 261. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
